channel.title: Ugh, i need help with this error
channel.description:
how do I fix this error:
[code]client.java:11790: illegal start of expression public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I tried to add another } above the code though it doesnt work...any ideas?

item.title: Ugh, i need help with this error
item.dc:creator: @t_cups t cups
item.description:
@t_cups wrote:

doesnt work…
EDIT: i figured it out… yay!

Read full topic

item.title: Ugh, i need help with this error
item.dc:creator: @darkandlightjak5 darkandlightjak5
item.description:
@darkandlightjak5 wrote:

Ehh I don’t know but try this

sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!"); else{ PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": "+command.substring(5); } } public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { }
